title: Dragon Legal 16.0 Speech Dictation and Voice Recognition Software [PC Download]
description: Nuance Dragon Legal v16 is the premier speech-recognition software built for practices of any size. Optimized for Windows 11 and compatible with Windows 10, Dragon Legal v16 empowers staff to create briefs, contracts and other documentation with a specialized legal vocabulary that delivers optimal recognition accuracy – up to 3x faster than typing. Powered by Deep Learning technology, the software delivers robust transcription tools, automatic citation formatting and new accessibility functionality. Partners, associates, and support staff can create and share powerful voice commands, shortcut repetitive processes, create and share custom words, and realize higher firm-wide productivity – all by using their voice.
